div.span: You Are Here: Home > 2020 Toyota Corolla Hybrid

div.h1: 2020 Toyota Corolla Hybrid for Sale in Warwick, RI

img.class: border border-primary aligncenter size-full wp-image-1403 lazyload-loading

div.p: For the first time ever, in the Toyota Corolla’s 12th generation, the popular sedan is available as an eco-friendly hybrid. The addition of this greener technology is a welcome addition to Toyota’s best-selling vehicle of all time. The long-anticipated 2020 Corolla Hybrid boasts standout fuel economy, of course, and it also comes standard with advanced safety features that you won’t find on most of its rivals, making it one of the safest vehicles in its class. In addition, it’s backed by Toyota’s legendary reputation for dependability and generous warranties. Now, let’s take a closer look at what makes the 2020 Corolla Hybrid such a great pick.

img.class: border border-primary aligncenter size-full wp-image-1405 lazyload-loading

hr.p: The ’20 Corolla Hybrid is only available in the LE trim. This model is powered by a 1.8-liter 4-cylinder aluminum DOHC 16-valve engine with Variable Valve Timing with Intelligence. It uses this four-cylinder gas engine and two electric motor-generators to deliver 121 horsepower and 105 lb.-ft. of torque, with the power sources seamlessly swapping duties as the system determines for the highest efficiency. This engine is paired to an electronically controlled continuously variable transmission (CVT) with front-wheel drive. Most remarkably, this hybrid engine gets an EPA-estimated 53 mpg city and 52 mpg highway, for a combined total rating of 52 mpg. This is up to 20 mpg more than the conventional (non-hybrid) 2020 Corolla.

img.class: border border-primary aligncenter size-full wp-image-1404 lazyload-loading

hr.p: To meet the growing needs of the modern consumer, the Corolla is chock-full of state-of-the-art tech features. Standard equipment on the ’20 Corolla Hybrid include LED headlights, automatic high beams, heated mirrors, push-to-start ignition, adaptive cruise control, automatic climate control with dust and pollen filters, a premium fabric-trimmed six-way adjustable driver’s seat, three driving modes, and a premium instrumentation panel. It also comes equipped with some outstanding infotainment features to keep you connected wherever you go. These features include an 8-inch multimedia touchscreen, two USB ports, Apple CarPlay, Siri Eyes Free, Amazon Alexa, Scout GPS Link, a Wi-Fi hotspot, Bluetooth audio streaming, and a six-speaker audio system.

Toyota is devoted to exceeding the industry safety standards, and the ’20 Corolla Hybrid is no exception. Passive safety features on this model include an advanced eight-airbag system, driver and front passenger whiplash-injury-lessening seats, an energy-absorbing collapsible steering column, front and rear energy-absorbing crumple zones with side-impact door beams, and high-tensile-strength steel body panels. The ’20 Corolla Hybrid also includes some advanced active safety features, led by Toyota Safety Sense 2.0, a package of driver-assist features: a pre-collision system with pedestrian detection, lane departure alert with steering assist, road edge detection with a sway warning system, automatic high beams, road sign assist, lane tracing assist, and full-speed range dynamic radar cruise control. Every Corolla Hybrid also gets Safety Connect emergency communications, for 24/7 roadside and emergency SOS assistance.

Tax, title, registration and $420 dealer doc & title prep not included in vehicle prices shown and must be paid by the purchaser. While great effort is made to ensure the accuracy of the information on this site, errors do occur so please verify information with a customer service rep.

**Sample finance payments are only estimates derived from the vehicle price with a 72 month term, 4.9% interest and 20% down payment. Rate is only an example and may not reflect currently available rates. With approved credit. Terms may vary.

em.p: Tax, title, registration and $420 dealer doc & title prep not included in vehicle prices shown and must be paid by the purchaser. While great effort is made to ensure the accuracy of the information on this site, errors do occur so please verify information with a customer service rep.

**Sample finance payments are only estimates derived from the vehicle price with a 72 month term, 4.9% interest and 20% down payment. Rate is only an example and may not reflect currently available rates. With approved credit. Terms may vary.

div.p: We appreciate your interest in our inventory, and we’re sorry we don’t have exactly what you’re searching for at this time. Please complete the form below to let us know what you’re looking for, or please call us at 401-352-5911.
